Chinese: 酒店式公寓/酒店式住宅
Jyutping: zau2dim3 sik1 gung1jyu6 / zau2dim3 sik1 zyu6zaak2
Yale: jáudim sīk gūngyuh / jáudim sīk jyuhjáak

English: Cafe De Coral, a famous local fast food shop established in 1968.
Literal meaning is "tea restaurant". It serves fast food from Hong Kong cuisine and Hong Kong-style Western cuisine.
